Click the following link to watch video: https://share.newscasts.refinitiv.com/link?entryId=1_8330fnnw&referenceId=1_8330fnnw&pageId=RefinitivNewscasts
Source: Reuters

Description: US employers added 467 thousand jobs in January - despite raging Covid 19 infections and worries about a labor shortage. New fears over inflation and rate rises leave markets volatile. Amazon sees four straight quarters of cloud computing sales growth. NSAP reports better than expected Q4 revenue
Short Link: https://refini.tv/3HrVlR1
